#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
long long arr1[1002],arr2[1002];
int main()
{
	long long i,t,n,k,flag;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n>>k;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		cin>>arr1[i];
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		cin>>arr2[i];
		sort(arr1,arr1+n);
		sort(arr2,arr2+n);
		reverse(arr2,arr2+n);
		flag=1;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(arr1[i]+arr2[i]<k)
			{
			flag=0;
			break;
		    }
		}
		if(flag)
		cout<<"YES"<<endl;
         else cout<<"NO"<<endl;
		
		
	}
	return 0;
}
